title: Missing loot  (BUG)
body:
hey guys i think ive found a new bug with the alpha client im missing 7 hextech chests and 3 keyfrags also one of my skin shards ( Infernal Nasus) which i was saving up for is missing and i got essence for it and now ill probs never see the shard again ive tryed both clients and there both not showing my loot.  


Riot Please i worked so hard to grind for those Keg frags 

Apart from that being missing and making me cry about missing chests this new client is looking good

replies.body: same, just realise that im missing a championship chest and a key that i was gonna keep
yea i really hope riot fix this cos my chests still arent showing up on either client and i worked hard for my money for rp
